plot outline: When 22-year-old Leon's best friend Ari shares tragic news about his battle with cancer, unemployed and desperate to help, Leon decides to become a criminal to pay for more cancer treatments. Leon is determined not to allow financial hardship to stand before Ari's life. Against the backdrop of contemporary Athens, Greece, Leon's actions to save his best friend have irreversible consequences.
plot: In Athens, Greece, an unemployed youth desperate to help his best friend fight cancer decides to become a criminal to pay for the treatments.
